featured.text: __(23)__ the Health Ministry and the Malaria Center, The CAMBODIA DAILY will distribute the nets to the most__(24)__ areas of the country. __(25)__ to this campaign and save three lives for only $5, send your donation to: American Assistance for Cambodia, P.O. Box 2716, GPO, New York, NY 10116.

definition.zh_def: 瘧疾，一種由瘧原蟲引起的傳染病，通常通過蚊子叮咬傳播，會導致發燒、寒顫和其他症狀。
definition.en_def: A disease caused by parasites of the genus Plasmodium, transmitted by the bite of infected mosquitoes, characterized by fever, chills, and flu-like symptoms.
definition.example: Malaria is a serious health issue in many tropical regions.
